itemLabel: Alexander Hardinge, 2nd Baron Hardinge of Penshurst
itemDescription: Private Secretary to the British King

wikipedia_page.main: Major Alexander Henry Louis Hardinge, 2nd Baron Hardinge of Penshurst,  (17 May 1894 – 29 May 1960) was Private Secretary to the Sovereign during the Abdication Crisis of Edward VIII and during most of the Second World War.
